description.raw:
I was checking the broken links and here is the first set of patches.

A couple of things more:

 * We should delete http://www.sdformat.org/user_guide/overview.html, old and probably unmaintained.
 * The gazebo user_guide was removed, wasn't it? If that is the case, where should I point to a link to the old started_model_database? In the scope:

~~~ 
Read through the Model Database documentation. You will be creating your own model, which must follow the formatting rules for the Gazebo Model Database directory structure.
~~~
